require.comment: Fundamental types used by many commands and structures
These types are part of the API, though not directly used in API commands or data structures
Sparse resource memory management API commands
Promoted from VK_KHR_relaxed_block_layout, which has no API
Promoted from VK_KHR_storage_buffer_storage_class, which has no API
Originally based on VK_KHR_subgroup (extension 94), but the actual enum block used was, incorrectly, that of extension 95
offset 1 reserved for the old VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_BIND_BUFFER_MEMORY_INFO_KHX enum
offset 2 reserved for the old VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_BIND_IMAGE_MEMORY_INFO_KHX enum

enum.name: VK_DEPENDENCY_DEVICE_GROUP_BIT
enum.comment: Dependency is across devices

enum.name: VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPLIT_INSTANCE_BIND_REGIONS_BIT
enum.comment: Allows using VkBindImageMemoryDeviceGroupInfo::pSplitInstanceBindRegions when binding memory to the image

enum.name: VK_MEMORY_HEAP_MULTI_INSTANCE_BIT
enum.comment: If set, heap allocations allocate multiple instances by default

enum.name: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_TRANSFER_SRC_BIT
enum.comment: Format can be used as the source image of image transfer commands

enum.name: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_TRANSFER_DST_BIT
enum.comment: Format can be used as the destination image of image transfer commands

enum.name: VK_IMAGE_CREATE_2D_ARRAY_COMPATIBLE_BIT
enum.comment: The 3D image can be viewed as a 2D or 2D array image

require.comment: Additional dependent types / tokens extending enumerants, not explicitly mentioned

Originally based on VK_KHR_protected_memory (extension 146), which was never published; thus the mystifying large value= numbers below. These are not aliased since they weren't actually promoted from an extension.

enum.name: VK_QUEUE_PROTECTED_BIT
enum.comment: Queues may support protected operations

enum.name: VK_DEVICE_QUEUE_CREATE_PROTECTED_BIT
enum.comment: Queue is a protected-capable device queue

enum.name: VK_MEMORY_PROPERTY_PROTECTED_BIT
enum.comment: Memory is protected

enum.name: VK_BUFFER_CREATE_PROTECTED_BIT
enum.comment: Buffer requires protected memory

enum.name: VK_IMAGE_CREATE_PROTECTED_BIT
enum.comment: Image requires protected memory

enum.name: VK_COMMAND_POOL_CREATE_PROTECTED_BIT
enum.comment: Command buffers allocated from pool are protected command buffers

enum.name: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_MIDPOINT_CHROMA_SAMPLES_BIT
enum.comment: Format can have midpoint rather than cosited chroma samples

enum.name: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_YCBCR_CONVERSION_LINEAR_FILTER_BIT
enum.comment: Format can be used with linear filtering whilst color conversion is enabled

enum.name: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_YCBCR_CONVERSION_SEPARATE_RECONSTRUCTION_FILTER_BIT
enum.comment: Format can have different chroma, min and mag filters

enum.name: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_DISJOINT_BIT
enum.comment: Format supports disjoint planes

enum.name: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_COSITED_CHROMA_SAMPLES_BIT
enum.comment: Format can have cosited rather than midpoint chroma samples

require.comment: Additional dependent types / tokens extending enumerants, not explicitly mentioned
Promoted from VK_KHR_shader_draw_parameters, with a feature support query added

enum.name: VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_MIRROR_CLAMP_TO_EDGE
enum.comment: No need to add an extnumber attribute, since this uses a core enum value

require.comment: Promoted from VK_EXT_shader_viewport_index_layer, which has no API (extension 163)

enum.name: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_FILTER_MINMAX_BIT
enum.comment: Format can be used with min/max reduction filtering

require.comment: This duplicates definitions in VK_KHR_device_group below

enum.name: VK_SWAPCHAIN_CREATE_SPLIT_INSTANCE_BIND_REGIONS_BIT_KHR
enum.comment: Allow images with VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPLIT_INSTANCE_BIND_REGIONS_BIT

enum.name: VK_SWAPCHAIN_CREATE_PROTECTED_BIT_KHR
enum.comment: Swapchain is protected

extension.name: VK_KHR_mir_surface
extension.author: KHR
extension.comment: Extension permanently disabled. Extension number should not be reused

require.comment: VK_ANDROID_native_buffer is used between the Android Vulkan loader and drivers to implement the WSI extensions. It isn't exposed to applications and uses types that aren't part of Android's stable public API, so it is left disabled to keep it out of the standard Vulkan headers.

enum.name: VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_DEBUG_REPORT_CREATE_INFO_EXT
enum.comment: Backwards-compatible alias containing a typo

require.comment: This duplicates definitions in other extensions, below

enum.name: VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_MIRROR_CLAMP_TO_EDGE
enum.comment: Note that this defines what was previously a core enum, and so uses the 'value' attribute rather than 'offset', and does not have a suffix. This is a special case, and should not be repeated

enum.name: VK_SAMPLER_ADDRESS_MODE_MIRROR_CLAMP_TO_EDGE_KHR
enum.comment: Alias introduced for consistency with extension suffixing rules

enum.name: VK_FORMAT_FEATURE_SAMPLED_IMAGE_FILTER_CUBIC_BIT_IMG
enum.comment: Format can be filtered with VK_FILTER_CUBIC_IMG when being sampled

enum.name: VK_SWAPCHAIN_CREATE_SPLIT_INSTANCE_BIND_REGIONS_BIT_KHR
enum.comment: Allow images with VK_IMAGE_CREATE_SPLIT_INSTANCE_BIND_REGIONS_BIT

enum.name: VK_DESCRIPTOR_SET_LAYOUT_CREATE_PUSH_DESCRIPTOR_BIT_KHR
enum.comment: Descriptors are pushed via flink:vkCmdPushDescriptorSetKHR

enum.name: VK_DESCRIPTOR_UPDATE_TEMPLATE_TYPE_PUSH_DESCRIPTORS_KHR
enum.comment: Create descriptor update template for pushed descriptor updates

enum.name: VK_DESCRIPTOR_UPDATE_TEMPLATE_TYPE_PUSH_DESCRIPTORS_KHR
enum.comment: Create descriptor update template for pushed descriptor updates

enum.name: VK_ACCESS_CONDITIONAL_RENDERING_READ_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: read access flag for reading conditional rendering predicate

enum.name: VK_BUFFER_USAGE_CONDITIONAL_RENDERING_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: Specifies the buffer can be used as predicate in conditional rendering

enum.name: VK_PIPELINE_STAGE_CONDITIONAL_RENDERING_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: A pipeline stage for conditional rendering predicate fetch

enum.name: VK_DESCRIPTOR_UPDATE_TEMPLATE_TYPE_PUSH_DESCRIPTORS_KHR
enum.comment: Create descriptor update template for pushed descriptor updates

enum.name: VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_SURFACE_CAPABILITIES2_EXT
enum.comment: Backwards-compatible alias containing a typo

extension.name: RESERVED_DO_NOT_USE_94
extension.comment: Used for functionality subsumed into Vulkan 1.1 and not published as an extension

require.comment: enum offset=0 was mistakenly used for the 1.1 core enum VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_PHYSICAL_DEVICE_SUBGROUP_PROPERTIES (value=1000094000). Fortunately, no conflict resulted.

enum.name: VK_COLOR_SPACE_DCI_P3_LINEAR_EXT
enum.comment: Deprecated name for backwards compatibility

extension.name: RESERVED_DO_NOT_USE_146
extension.comment: Used for functionality subsumed into Vulkan 1.1 and not published as an extension

enum.name: VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_QUERY_POOL_CREATE_INFO_INTEL
enum.comment: Backwards-compatible alias

require.comment: These enums are present only to inform downstream consumers like KTX2. There is no actual Vulkan extension corresponding to the enums.
